about_the_game:
In EON Trooper, you join a galaxy at war, assuming the role of an elite soldier on missions behind enemy lines. Each mission is a unique challenge requiring careful planning and swift execution. Whether you are sabotaging enemy bases, stealing vital information, or simply surviving, you will need to utilize all tools and tactics at your disposal.

EON Trooper combines intense action, tactical strategy, and a wide variety of gameplay options into an unforgettable experience. Whether you prefer stealth, combat, or a combination of both, EON Trooper has something for you.

Key Features:

Strategic Freedom: Infiltrate enemy bases with stealth, unleash armed chaos, or combine both approaches. You decide how to play each mission.

Alert Mechanics: Movement and gunfire create sound areas that can alert enemies. Control your noise and stay out of sight to avoid detection.

Wide Arsenal: Packed with options to suit your playstyle. From firearms with limited ammo to knives for silent kills, and a variety of devices and traps to use to your advantage.

Alarm System: Keep control of the situation or face the consequences. Alarms will increase with gunshots, but you can deactivate them if you find the right devices.

Violent Cartoon Style: Experience a game with a cartoon visual style that contrasts with its intense and bloody level of violence.

Extraction and Upgrade: Collect loot from your fallen enemies, upgrading your weapons and devices between missions. But be careful, you could lose everything if you die.

Variety of Enemies and Locations: Face a wide range of enemies, from conventional armed forces to aliens and automated defense systems, in various locations including deserts, snowy areas, and spaceships.

Join the galactic fight with EON Trooper. Whether in stealth or total chaos, every mission counts.
